tag_list: ceo, executive, online-media, advertising, hispanic, spanish
overview:
Justin is the founder and CEO of Pulpo Media–a leading digital media company focused on the global Hispanic markets.

Prior to founding Pulpo Media, Justin served as Vice President of Tribal Fusionâ€™s Publisher Network, where he led the company to become the second largest advertising network. He has over a decade of marketing, business development and campaign management experience, having managed online campaigns for hundreds of companies including Monster, Verizon Wireless, Google, and Microsoft. Before joining Tribal Fusion and Exponential, Justin managed marketing and advertising programs at Ask.com (IAC) and Wind River (Intel).

He has also consulted for top online publishers, including properties acquired by AOL and eBay, to help them grow traffic and revenue through his SEO, SEM and display advertising expertise. Mr. Kuykendall sits on the advisory boards of leading online advertising and media companies including Pubmatic, Turn, Komli, and Technorati.

He has a double B.A. in International Relations and Latin American Studies, and completed his Masters and PhD coursework at the Universidad de Salamanca in Spain.
